#labels Featured
<p>
Unzip <a href="http://code.google.com/p/ketai/downloads/detail?name=Ketai_v5.zip&can=2&q=">Ketai_v5.zip</a> and move to your sketchbook "libraries" folder. Restart Processing. Examples and Reference documentation is included.
</p>

= v5 Update log = 
<p>
- repackaging of the data analysis/capture framework
- flash support for cameras
- support for multiple cameras
- camera will now fallback to nearest requested resolution
- save camera picture to media store
- updates to location object to provide faster location value
</p>
